creator: ilovejmeter@gmail.com
text:
I have downloaded latest JMeter sources

I have stuck various jars I want in lib/ext/

when I run ant it says

 Classes for IAIK iSaSiLk not found in classpath

I think I read somewhere that the build file shouldn't
ask for IAIK iSaSiLK anymore.

This has been fixed in the 2.1 branch; however the code has yet to be merged 
into trunk. This will be done at some stage.

At present, it would be better to use the 2.1 branch.
creator: sebb@apache.org
